974080.name: Fantasy Grounds - Monstrous Characters, Volume 6 (Token Pack)
974080.description:
Monstrous Characters, Volume 6

Make your game more monstrous with Monster Grin's 176 unique new tokens, each usable as PCs, NPCs, mooks, monsters, or bosses! This pack contains both the Normal" and the "Monstrous" forms of several characters: human males and females as well as their Jekyll and Hyde forms and their ghostly forms - perfect for before and after changes in game! This tokens will amp up the awesome monster potential for your game.
Utilize Monster Grin's Token Halo System to create different types of teams (red, gold, green, black, silver, or blue), or even different levels of the same kind of creature (i.e. boss, high, medium, or low level) to help keep track of what's what and who's who and keep your game rockin'!
This token pack includes (ringed in black, blue, gold, green, greyscale, and silver, as well as ethereal, invisible, stone-skinned, sand-skinned, and altered state versions):
  • Human Male in "Normal" Form
  • Human Male in "Monstrous" Ghost Form
  • Human Female in "Normal" Form
  • Human Female in "Monstrous" Ghost Form
  • Human Male in "Normal" Jekyll Form
  • Human Male in "Monstrous" Hyde Form
  • Human Female in "Normal" Jekyll Form
  • Human Female in "Monstrous" Hyde Form
